ccre.drivers.chrobotics

Class InternalUM7LT

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.drivers.chrobotics.InternalUM7LT

  • public class InternalUM7LT
extends java.lang.Object
    The low-level interface to the UM7-LT orientation sensor from CH Robotics, via RS232. This is not complete. If you need more functionality, you may need to modify this class.
    Author:
    skeggsc
    See Also:
    UM7LT

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DREG_BASE
      The first register that is tracked by the dregs cache.
      static int DREG_EULER_PHI_THETA
      The ID of the Euler Phi Theta register.
      static int DREG_EULER_PHI_THETA_DOT
      The ID of the Euler Phi Theta Dot register.
      static int DREG_EULER_PSI
      The ID of the Euler Psi register.
      static int DREG_EULER_PSI_DOT
      The ID of the Euler Psi Dot register.
      static int DREG_EULER_TIME
      The ID of the Euler Time register.
      static int DREG_HEALTH
      The ID of the Health register.
      static int DREG_LAST
      The last register that is tracked by the dregs cache.
      int[] dregs
      The register cache for data coming from the UM7LT.
      int[] dregsUpdateAt
      The last time that the corresponding entry in the register cache was updated.
      static float EULER_CONVERSION_DIVISOR
      The conversion divisor to convert from the signed shorts in the Euler rotation registers to angles in degrees.
      static float EULER_RATE_CONVERSION_DIVISOR
      The conversion divisor to convert from the signed shorts in the Euler rotation rate registers to angular velocities in degrees per second.
      int lastUpdateId
      The last update ID - the pseudo-clock used for tracking register cache updates.
      long lastUpdateTime
      The last time that any cached registers were updated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InternalUM7LT(SerialIO rs232, EventOutput onUpdate)
      Create a new internal handler for the UM7LT that runs on a rs232 port and fires onUpdate whenever the cached registers update.

      • dregs

        The register cache for data coming from the UM7LT.
        See Also:
        dregsUpdateAt

      • dregsUpdateAt

        public int[] dregsUpdateAt
        The last time that the corresponding entry in the register cache was updated. This is an update ID.
        See Also:
        dregs, lastUpdateId

      • lastUpdateId

        public int lastUpdateId
        The last update ID - the pseudo-clock used for tracking register cache updates.
        See Also:
        dregs, dregsUpdateAt, lastUpdateTime

      • lastUpdateTime

        public long lastUpdateTime
        The last time that any cached registers were updated. Updated exactly when lastUpdateId is updated.
        See Also:
        lastUpdateId

    • Constructor Detail

      • InternalUM7LT

        public InternalUM7LT(SerialIO rs232,
             EventOutput onUpdate)
        Create a new internal handler for the UM7LT that runs on a rs232 port and fires onUpdate whenever the cached registers update.
        Parameters:
        rs232 - the RS232 port connected to the UM7LT.
        onUpdate - the output to update when the cached registers update.

    • Method Detail

      • writeSettings

        public void writeSettings(int quaternion_rate,
                 int euler_rate,
                 int position_rate,
                 int velocity_rate,
                 int health_rate_step)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Write settings for the update rates of some of the currently-supported rates. Not everything is currently supported! This may need extension if you want to do more with the UM7LT.
        Parameters:
        quaternion_rate - how often to update the quaternion registers. (Specified in 0-255 Hz)
        euler_rate - how often to update the Euler angle registers. (Specified in 0-255 Hz)
        position_rate - how often to update the position registers. (Specified in 0-255 Hz)
        velocity_rate - how often to update the velocity registers. (Specified in 0-255 Hz)
        health_rate_step - how often to update the health register. (Specification is not in Hertz. See the UM7LT manual.)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the setting cannot be written due to an IO Exception during communication.

      • handleRS232Input

        public void handleRS232Input(int count)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Handle up to the specified number of packets from the RS232 input.
        Parameters:
        count - the maximum number of packets to handle before returning.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO Exception occurs during processing.

      • zeroGyros

        public void zeroGyros()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Command the UM7LT to zero the Gyroscope.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the command could not be sent.

      • doReadOperation

        public void doReadOperation(byte address)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Command the UM7LT to read and report a certain register.
        Parameters:
        address - the register address to read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the command could not be sent.

      • doBatchReadOperation

        public void doBatchReadOperation(byte address,
                        int count)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Command the UM7LT to read and report a series of registers.
        Parameters:
        address - the register address to start reading at.
        count - the number of registers to read.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the command could not be sent.

      • doWriteOperation

        public void doWriteOperation(byte address,
                    int value)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Command the UM7LT to modify a certain register.
        Parameters:
        address - the register address to read.
        value - the new value to contain.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the command could not be sent.

      • doBatchWriteOperation

        public void doBatchWriteOperation(byte address,
                         int[] values)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Command the UM7LT to modify a series of registers.
        Parameters:
        address - the register address to start writing at.
        values - the array of values to write, starting at the address.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the command could not be sent.

      • dumpSerialData

        public void dumpSerialData()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Dump serial data until the buffer is emptied, at least temporarily.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a communication error occurs while dumping serial data.
